remarks: The function value of the extension of a permutation, fixing the additional element, for the additional element.  (Contributed by AV, 6-Jan-2019.)
statement:
symgext.s $e |- S = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` ( N \ { K } ) ) ) $.
symgext.e $e |- E = ( x e. N |-> if ( x = K , K , ( Z ` x ) ) ) $.
symgextfve $p |- ( K e. N -> ( X = K -> ( E ` X ) = K ) ) $.
$d K x $.
$d N x $.
$d S x $.
$d X x $.
$d Z x $.
